title: Curfew lifted for 12 hours today
body_lines: The curfew currently in effect in the entire island in accordance with the provisions of Section 16 of the Public Security Ordinance will be lifted at 6 a.m. today for a period of 12 hours, the President’s Media Division announced.
The curfew will be re-imposed at 6 p.m. today and will be in effect until 5 a.m. tomorrow.

Accordingly, no one is permitted to stay on a public road, railway line, public park, public playground, or any other public area or beach, without the written permission of an authorising officer during the curfew period.
